>
[True Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5796) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Greater Debilitating Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5789)

</column>

---

You have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede your foes. When you use Debilitating Bomb, add the following to the list of effects you can choose from: [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71), [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94), or a –15-foot status penalty to Speeds.
